channel.title: Obama
channel.description:
So, me and my parents were having a discussion about our president Barack Obama, we were basically just ranting about our opinions on him, so id like to know yours, keep it clean please. btw, this is probably a VERY boring subject, but ah well.
- [b]YoungMula[/b]

item.title: Obama
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

[quote]It is my belief that Socialism and Communism has taken up refuge in the world environmental movement.

Environmentalism - The Last Bastion of Communism!

Sounds like communism to me Rush!!

(Quotes from http://www.rushonline.com/visitors/globalwarming.htm)

What does communism has to do with Global Warming? Is this Rush Limbaugh similar to that idiot Bill O’Reilly? One of those arrogant Christfags who think they know it all, while they are too arrogant to even listen to what others say?

Anyways, our good friend Mr. Limbaugh doesn’t provide us with any evidence that proves he is right.[/quote]
Wow… I wouldn’t be surprised if that letter was fake, but then again there are a lot of idiots out there…

Read full topic

item.title: Obama
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Arr0w, post:101, topic:289602”][quote author=Frell link=topic=382801.msg2946438#msg2946438 date=1252246165]

You guys need to also think of what could happen if we stopped all the cars and factories that give off GH gases. The earth may have already adapted to having this much in the atmosphere and as soon as its gone catastrophic things could happen.
[/quote]
If the Earth has already adapted how come we are still burning holes in the ozone?[/quote]
We don’t burn hole in the ozone, the ozone disappear because of other gases.

Read full topic

item.title: Obama
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:100, topic:289602”][quote author=yakman link=topic=382801.msg2946250#msg2946250 date=1252237978]

you climate change deniers are just another conspiracy theory.
you expect us to believe that the entire scientific establishment is lying to us.

fuck off

The climate is changing, but its from a natural cycle that the earth goes through. We’re coming out of an ice age… That’s what i mean by a scam, people are using it as an excuse to raise money to help/fix an inevitable event/cycle.

Every major unbias scientific authority accepts that climate change is caused by human activities.

[size=13pt]You’re asking me to believe that they are all lying. Does that not seem even a little unrealistic to you?[/size]

you’ve still given me no reason why I should believe you guys with an obvious agenda instead of every major unbias scientific authority.
[/quote]
They’re lying and supporting it because if they found out it wasn’t happening the government would cut the funding to the universities that research it.[/quote]

How do you explain non-American scientific institutions who accept human-caused climate change?
Do British universities need to lie to get funding? Do Chinese, Japanise or Swiss ones need to lie?

You wrongly assume that the entire world shares the American attitude to science.

It is also wrong to suggest that scientific institutions have the most to profit or lose from climate change.
Oil companies have far more money to spread their mis-information.

Exxon, for instance had just under $5billion revenue in the year 2008 [size=6pt]source[/size]

If you look at it in terms of money, oil companies have a bigger agenda and a bigger motive to lie.

Frell and other climate change deniers are just like holocaust deniers, creationists, AIDS deniers and the people who say smoking doesnt give you cancer.
You guys need to take your head out of the sand and at least stop hinding if you dont want to help.

Read full topic

item.title: Obama
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Arr0w, post:105, topic:289602”][quote author=Frell link=topic=382801.msg2946472#msg2946472 date=1252247085]

Frell, the earth can’t adapt to Greenhouse gases. It’s too divers to do so. And the scientific world won’t conspire against the rest of the world. Don’t you think a scientist that finds out that global warming is fake gets instant respect? Scientists are humans too. What would you rather do: stand in a crowd or be the person that leads it?

Many Scientists already probably know its fake, yes if they admit it they will be respected BUT they don’t want to do that. They’re trying to get as much money out of the funds towards it as they can because its giving them long awaited new equipment etc. If they spoke up, after everyone clapped and cheered the Governments would cut the funding as it nolonger poses as a threat to humanity.
[/quote]

source?[/quote]

I am withholding his name and location as this is being written without his knowledge. It seems that funding may indeed be the issue. If one does not agree with the "correct" stand, even when it cannot be supported, one cannot easily obtain research money. Galileo, move over.
http://www.rushonline.com/visitors/globalwarming.htm - Tones of reasons why GW is false.

Read full topic

item.title: Obama
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:95, topic:289602”][quote author=yakman link=topic=382801.msg2944132#msg2944132 date=1252107669]

you climate change deniers are just another conspiracy theory.
you expect us to believe that the entire scientific establishment is lying to us.

fuck off

The climate is changing, but its from a natural cycle that the earth goes through. We’re coming out of an ice age… That’s what i mean by a scam, people are using it as an excuse to raise money to help/fix an inevitable event/cycle.

Every major unbias scientific authority accepts that climate change is caused by human activities.

[size=13pt]You’re asking me to believe that they are all lying. Does that not seem even a little unrealistic to you?[/size]
[/quote]

you’ve still given me no reason why I should believe you guys with an obvious agenda instead of every major unbias scientific authority.[/quote]
They’re lying and supporting it because if they found out it wasn’t happening the government would cut the funding to the universities that research it.

[quote=".Unlimited, post:96, topic:289602"]This is a rather good article about Carbon Dioxide.
http://www.lenntech.com/carbon-dioxide.htm

The ozone layer helps deflect harmful UV rays from the sun, With the hole in the ozone layer these harmful UV rays are able to get past the ozone layer and to the Earth’s surface. Once inside the greenhouse effect takes place. After humans building up the greenhouse gases it multiples the affect of the ‘green house’.

If carbon dioxide is too heavy to get into the atmosphere how do you expect it to get out of the hole in the ozone layer?

Even if humans aren’t causing the global warming, why shouldn’t we change to more energy efficient ways to do things. We are going to run out of natural gas one day and before that day comes we should have put things into effect way before to help prevent mass conflict.

Also shouldn’t we make a thread in the debates sections just about global warming not obama and global warming? ;)[/quote]
Im for getting off of oil. I always hate that feeling that you need something else, like when you buy a paintball gun you’re not done buying. You’re going to need paintballs and what if the store has none left. For a car you need oil. Bad example i guess but yea.

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:98, topic:289602”][quote author=.Unlimited link=topic=382801.msg2946259#msg2946259 date=1252239204]
This is a rather good article about Carbon Dioxide.
http://www.lenntech.com/carbon-dioxide.htm

The ozone layer helps deflect harmful UV rays from the sun, With the hole in the ozone layer these harmful UV rays are able to get past the ozone layer and to the Earth’s surface. Once inside the greenhouse effect takes place. After humans building up the greenhouse gases it multiples the affect of the ‘green house’.

If carbon dioxide is too heavy to get into the atmosphere how do you expect it to get out of the hole in the ozone layer?

Even if humans aren’t causing the global warming, why shouldn’t we change to more energy efficient ways to do things. We are going to run out of natural gas one day and before that day comes we should have put things into effect way before to help prevent mass conflict.

Also shouldn’t we make a thread in the debates sections just about global warming not obama and global warming?
[/quote]
Please rewrite your post.

A hole in the Ozon layer is a area with weak protection not without any O[sub]3[/sub] at all, UV rays hit us anyway.
The hole in the ozonlayer have nothing to do with globalwarming.

We don’t multiply the effect, it will just increse the temprature by some degree, without greenhouse gases it had been to cold here to live.[/quote]
Yes but we are digging up oil from underground that hasn’t been touched in millions of years and burning it into the atmosphere, but like i said, you guys aren’t thinking of how powerful nature is. It has its own process for things like this.

You guys need to also think of what could happen if we stopped all the cars and factories that give off GH gases. The earth may have already adapted to having this much in the atmosphere and as soon as its gone catastrophic things could happen.

Read full topic

Also shouldn’t we make a thread in the debates sections just about global warming not obama and global warming?

We don’t multiply the effect, it will just increse the temprature by some degree, without greenhouse gases it had been to cold here to live.[/quote]

item.title: Obama
item.dc:creator: @arr0w Arr0w
item.description:
@arr0w wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:93, topic:289602”][quote author=Frell link=topic=382801.msg2945828#msg2945828 date=1252205221]

There is still evidence that human’s are causing recent temp. changes, and obviously big enough changes for most scientist to care.

Everyone knows there’s something happening, we aren’t helping, we aren’t effecting, and we are not the cause, so its a natural cycle.

How would we go about ‘cooling’ the earth then?

We could stop heating up the earth by reducing are green house gases, so we don’t fuck up the cycle anymore.

Oh so so Volcanoes aren’t random at all, people never have died from them because they’re a natural cycle and they know when to get the hell out. They don’t throw peoples days off by erupting during dinner time…
[/quote]

Greenhouse gases are also caused by cars, or anything that uses gas.[/quote]

Greenhouse gases are natural gases…They have been there since the start of the Earth. But true, cars contribute but you’re wrong about greenhouse gases being caused by it. It’s been proven that without the greenhouse effect(which is also natural - we’re just merely speeding it up) the Earth would not exist.

Read full topic

item.title: Obama
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

yakman:

wow I love how you try to move away from climate-change denial as soon as its shown to be a conspiracy theory.

Oh sorry i didn’t even see coopers reply

[quote=“cooper, post:84, topic:289602”]http://aquarium.ucsd.edu/climate/Climate_Change_FAQ/

[quote]
QUESTION: Scientists disagree. We don’t know the science well enough yet, so why should we do anything?
ANSWER: Actually, there is strong scientific consensus on the reality of human-caused climate change. See the consensus/position statements of: - National Academy of Sciences - Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) - American Geophysical Union (AGU) - American Meteorological Society (AMS) - American Association for the Advancement of Science (AAAS) Oreskes (Science, 2004) analyzed all abstracts in refereed scientific publications from 1993-2003 with the keywords “global climate change” (928 papers). None disagreed with the consensus position that human activities are causing the current warming.
[/quote][/quote]
Still, there’s no since in attempting to solve it, many big businesses and oil companies care about money more than the environment. And like i said, volcanoes do more damage than we do in 100 years in 1 eruption.

Honestly im not a global warming expert, but i do believe its a bunch of shit. Fossil fuels are burned naturally everyday so when we decide to burn them to power vehicles etc its a problem?

The recent ‘jump’ in warming can also be linked to MT ST Helens eruption in 2006: http://www.foxnews.com/story/0,2933,237578,00.html and http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/6635776/

[b][size=12pt]They also release carbon dioxide, the greenhouse gas that's primarily blamed for global warming. Mount St. Helens produces between 500 and 1,000 tons a day of carbon dioxide, Gerlach estimates.[/size][/b]

Every year the arctic ice pack breaks up, why no change in sea level? Frozen ice displaces the same amount of water as melted ice, if not less. Ice expands when frozen.

Major Volcanic Eruptions of the Past 250 Years
Eruption VEI DVI/Emax IVI
Grimsvotn [Lakagigar], Iceland 1783
Tambora, Sumbawa, Indonesia 1815
Cosiguina, Nicaragua 1835
Askja, Iceland 1875
Krakatau, Indonesia 1883
Okataina [Tarawera], North Island, New Zealand 1886
Santa Maria, Guatemala 1902
Ksudach, Kamchatka, Russia 1907
Novarupta [Katmai], Alaska, United States 1912
Agung, Bali, Indonesia 1963
Mount St. Helens, Washington, United States 1980
El Chicho´n, Chiapas, Mexico 1982

Known natural causes of warming, such as the sun, have been constant in the past 30 years, so they cannot explain the warming of the past 30 years

Heyyy what do ya know!! between 1960-2000 there were 4 major eruptions!

We also haven’t been able to trace warming like we can now, so there’s your jump.

kthxbai.

Just Use Logic

Do you believe in Man-Made Global warming? Well, you shouldn’t!

Why?

You don’t need a huge think-tank to see through the propaganda. Here’s how to figure out the truth for yourself:

  1. Have you looked at your own outside thermometer? Record lows and snow storms abound.

  2. Seventh grade physics shows that CO2’s molecular weight makes it very heavy. It can’t rise high enough to cause the greenhouse effect.

Yes, there is a greenhouse effect, but it’s mostly caused by water vapor! H2O is much lighter than CO2.

  1. College freshman statistics will show you that the error rate in temperature samples used is greater than the claimed temperature rise.

  2. Glaciers in Greenland have recently been shown to be getting thcker, not thinner. Same with antarctic ice, which is never mentioned by warming alarmists.

  3. Stories of polar bears declining are lies, according to our government’s own figures.

  4. CO2 is plant food! When the earth was young, there was very little free oxygen. It was poisonous to the few life forms here (primitive bacteria and plants). It increased to today’s levels partly as exhaust from plants and partly from a few comets “visiting.”

  5. Clearing of forests happens only where governments own the forest. Private ownership of forests results in cyclical growing and cutting. They don’t waste the economic value of their own land! Take a look at the huge forests in Georgia and Florida, owned by Weyerhauser & other lumber companies.

  6. Sunspot activity is in a cycle in which it reduces warming radiation from the sun. This is actually causing a cooling cycle.

  7. What about recent record cold temperatures and snow storms?

  8. Why is it that the big scares always mean big profits for companies connected to governments. E.g. GE owns NBC, which is scaring us. But GE makes big dollars from sales of generators, nuclear, windmills, and solar to governments.

  9. Those who want US to completely change our lives are immune. How about Al Gore making his millions - driving his SUVs, owning several energy inefficient HOMES, plura. He tells us to stop using gas, while he is private-jetting around to give big money speeches?

  10. We’re supposed to forget similar false fears. Many of the same companies made big money off the “ozone layer” scam. Remember that one? It has also proven false. But, the media which scared us about it has remained silent. Instead, they come up with a new scary theory.

  11. About 7 years ago, the same government-connected scientists and insiders were trying to scare us with the coming ice age. Remember that?

  12. Volcanoes and the ocean are by FAR larger sources of CO2 and other “greenhouse” gases. Many, many, many multiples of the amounts we exhaust.

  13. NASA was actually caught faking “warming” data. They simply copied September temperatures and submitted the same figures for October. They then claimed October was the hottest it’s been in decades.

If “Global Warming” is true, why fudge figures? I am very skeptical when someone - especially a government insider - is trying to scare me and grab my wallet at the same time.

Fear is used to turn off the logical part of your brain. It makes you an easier “mark.”

So, beware of the scare! Don’t believe “officials” just because of their title.


http://hubpages.com/hub/Global-Warming-Fake-01

Seeing as how in the end Co2 has no effect on the ozone layer, then this so called “ozone hole” would actually cool the earth by releasing the ‘greenhouse gases’. SO THE SOLUTION WOULD BE TO DO NOTHING! Think of nature as you would your body, when you have too much food in your body, you throw up. If the earth has too much co2 in the air, it would have its own way to get rid of it.

We then go back into the original fact, that its a natural cycle. Recent sun activity has not only effect the ice caps on earth, but on mars also: http://science.nasa.gov/headlines/y2003/07aug_southpole.htm

What does this say? Its a natural cycle that we have no control over. Something this complex is managed by nature and nature has its ways of controlling and sustaining itself. The ocean absorbs most of the co2 anyway… That means all the underwater plants are turning it into oxygen and re-releasing it into the ocean for fish. So think of all the underwater plants on the ocean floor, the ocean takes up 70% of the earth. That’s ALOT of water sitting on a HUGE sea floor with SUPERFAGINCRAFRIGILLIONs of plants all absorbing MASSIVE amounts of co2.

Yakman, for someone so excellent at proving the non existence of god, i was almost sure you would have already knew it was a lie. They’re doing exactly what they did with Christianity:

Make you feel guilty (Adam sinned/ you drive a car and pollute)
Scare you (Hell/ Heating of the earth and floods from ice caps)
Make you give back (Church/ Give your money to Al Gore and buy new cars etc)

To many people are falling for this, it is a complete lie for universities to convince the government that its a threat to humanity so the government can whip out money for them to research it.

We couldn’t make the earth warmer than we wanted to, so how would we make it colder.

Read full topic
